Subtechnique.Subtechnique_Name: File and Directory Permissions Modification: Windows File and Directory Permissions Modification

Substeps.Criteria: cmd.exe deletes system backups via vssadmin and del

Footnotes: During execution of the Evaluation, no relevant system backup files were present/enabled in the environment though the CMD commands to delete them was executed. The detection method(s) exhibited are subsequently scoped.

Substeps.Criteria: ryuk.exe adjusts its token to include SE_PRIVILEGE_ENABLED via AdjustTokenPrivileges()

Footnotes: During execution of the Evaluation, there were no resulting changes to the token of ryuk.exe, though the AdjustTokenPrivileges() API function was executed, since the target SE_PRIVILEGE_ENABLED privilege was already enabled in the process token. The detection method(s) exhibited are subsequently scoped.
